strapiPost.title: Detective Work
strapiPost.content:
Art Feeds, a local non-profit that provides resources and spaces where children can express their creativity, is kicking off its digital summer camp with Artist Detective.

  • Art Feeds Camp: Artist Detective is a 4-day digital art summer camp, calling on young artists to use their creativity and problem solving skills to crack a mysterious case. Every day of the camp, the artist detective is one step closer to solving the mystery.
  • WFH: Campers will have everything they need to have fun making art at their own pace and from their home. Campers will be able to watch projects and instructions for each "day" of camp starting July 6th.

Find out more about Art Feeds Art Camp HERE. ALL proceeds from Camp in a Box support our year round Community Assist Program.
